name: GeoJam
description:
Overview:

Spin around the earth hunting for the desired country in the least amount of time. Find three countries correctly before finding out where you rank on the leaderboard.

Controls:

  • [Move the mouse] to spin the globe.
  • [Left mouse click] to guess a country.
  • [Scroll Wheel] zoom in and out.
  • Press [Alt] + [F4] to exit the game.

This was made for the PIGSquad summer slow jam. The game jam theme was "Edutainment".

Odd Game Jam Behavior:

  • There is no in-game button to quit. Use [Alt] + [F4].
  • The leaderboard is local, so fast completion times are wiped from the leaderboard history every time the game is launched.
  • Only the African nations are implemented at this point.
  • Some of the countries are pretty small, so zoom in and out.
